definitions.definition: A substance with medicinal properties intended to restore or invigorate.
examples: We used to brew a tonic from a particular kind of root.

definitions.definition: ( US , Eastern Massachusetts , dated ) Any of various carbonated , non- alcoholic beverages ; soda pop .
( figuratively ) Someone or something that revitalises or reinvigorates .

main_definition: A substance with medicinal properties intended to restore or invigorate.
secondary_definitions: ( US , Eastern Massachusetts , dated ) Any of various carbonated , non- alcoholic beverages ; soda pop .
( figuratively ) Someone or something that revitalises or reinvigorates .

definitions.definition: The first note of a diatonic scale ; the keynote .
The triad built on the tonic note.
A tonic element or letter; a vowel or a diphthong .

main_definition: ( music ) The first note of a diatonic scale ; the keynote .
secondary_definitions: ( music ) The triad built on the tonic note.
( phonetics ) A tonic element or letter; a vowel or a diphthong .
